Can not reproduce. Test in Websphere 6. BIRT 2.1 deployment succeeded and run some report files, everything is well.

NPE is not thrown during deploy, it could appear when you run one report design, right?

The NPE is thrown when you run some special ones? If so, could you attach the report design file?

birt.war was from birt-runtime-2_1_0.zip, my websphere edition is 5.1.0 base edition,pls using WAS5 NOT WAS 6,they are different.
yes,the url is http://localhost:9080/birt/frameset?__report=test.rptdesign&sample=my+parameter
as you see,birt is my application context
it is not special file(test.rptdesign from birt).
when you deploy the birt.war to websphere 5.1, you will meet another error,pls using PARENT_LAST classloading of webapp.
and restart server,you will got through the former error and got the NPE.
thanks
